amendment.description: Amendment transfers $25 million from the United States Information Agency to the Food for Peace program. \ As amended by the Brownback amendment (A009) the reductions in funds for the USIA was revised to include radio construction and broadcasting.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 26 in the Congressional Record of May 23, to increase by $25 million funds authorized in the bill for Food For Peace and related humanitarian programs. The additional funds would come from of reductions in a variety of administrative accounts.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bereuter amendment (A008) as amended Agreed to by voice vote.
